question:
The temperature of a fixed volume of an ideal gas is raised from 300K to 330K.
Which of the following statements about the gas is/are true?
description:
1) The mean energy of the particles of the gas increases by 10% 
 2) The mean square velocity of the particles increases by 10% 
 3) The number of collisions per second with the walls of the container increases by 10%

question:
One million electrons travel between two points in a circuit.
The total energy gained by the electrons is 1.6x10<sup>-10</sup>J.

What is the potential difference between the two points?
Which is not a unit of energy?
